sentence: both we decided to have breakfast in our room and it was fantastic we was both stuffed we had a dip in the pool and decided to book a spa day for the following week the whole experience was fantastic thankyou to all the staff at the radison for your excellent service
Superb pool and leisure facilitiesThe room was just fantastic large double bed excellent TV wifi and a superb bathroom
The pool spa and gym areas are well equipped and give a calm welcoming feeling great selection of treatments and plenty of choice for activitiesWould highly recommend and will be visiting again
The location is as good as it gets and the pool was clean nicely lit and never felt crowded
The gym was easy to use and the pool was great because it opened early and was not busy in the early morning good for a swimmer wanting to do laps
All the staff at the hotel are friendly and helpful and the spa and pool are very nice
Nice Hotel and Location good Swimming Pool
The pool and spa area were lovely and clean
The pool and spa areaFriendly and helpful staff Location of the hotel
The rooms were comfortable and the spa pool was great
Would stay again after the pool refurb
We also went to the pool in the late afternoon and it was not busy and also very clean
We arrive to find out that the pool and spa are shut guted

Staff were excellent and I would stay again but when we booked it would of been nice knowing the spa was not available had packed my swimming costume for nothing the air conditioning in room was broken kept blowing cold air out even though set to 22 degrees room was cold all night

rooms very nice large and cleanwe did not know until we arrived that the pool and hotel was not open during our stay and confusion over whether breakfast was included as we believed it was from the internet advert
Upon arrival I have asked the Concierge about the way to the Spa and Pool
The pool was being refurbished and I had booked this hotel for a pool in the city centre
At our time of booking we booked this hotel especially for its location reviews and the fact that it had a pool steam and sauna
Has a steam room sauna jacuzi and treatment rooms
It was 11 am and the children swim time finished at 12 noon
We were misinformed about the opening times for children for the pool and my son has autism so it caused stress and anxiety to him
Few minor issues with wrong info for children times in pool which caused upset to our 11 year old child who has autism
We checked in a bit late in the evening so shame we did n’t get the chance to try the spa and pool but from the lounge it looked really nice
Swimming pool perfectThey worth any penny
Then jumped into the pool which was a perfect temperature followed by the jacuzi
The swimming pool facilities were clean there was one small jacuzi so if there was someone else in you had to wait til they had finished and then you could have a quick turn
so if you have little ones ask for pool noodles or a kick board for them if they ca n’t touch or are still not super confident with their swimming
even though I was n’t staying right then I was taken personally with my son to see the pool and spa
It is quite a small pool and jacuzi however we were lucky as it was quiet Monday with us having it to ourselves
Pool and jacuzi were small
